description: Defiantly powerful, grippy and serious about trail adventuring. A super-charged trail shoe that channels grip from the ground up. SUPERCROSS 4 is a no-compromise, unapologetic trail renegade with even bigger lugs and extra grooves for maximum mud shedding and powered grip. Its tire-like outsole acts in fusion with the toughened upper and Sensifit construction for superior hold, fit, and undeniable comfort.
name: Salomon Supercross 4 - Mens
